Thus, the ego car needs to watch the truck's signals and motion to predict its path and navigate accordingly.

Lastly, there are orange and white vertical barriers on the right side of the intersection, marking an area of restricted access, possibly due to construction work. It is necessary for the ego car to avoid this section and maintain its course along the designated lanes.
